args.question: Prepare the data for plotting the year of the oldest painting per genre. Extract genre and year information.

xmode.name: data_preparation

xmode.content:
{'status': 'success', 'plot_path': '/home/bleon/git/XMODE/ArtWork/experiments/log-batch/anthropic-claude-sonnet-4-5-20250929/20251208-174301-r001/oldest_painting_per_genre.png', 'note': 'Plot created successfully!:
```python

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

# Data from the user
data = [
    {'genre': 'religious art', 'oldest_year': 1438, 'painting_title': 'Predella of the Barbadori altarpiece'},
    {'genre': 'Hodegetria', 'oldest_year': 1500, 'painting_title': 'Our Lady of Piasek'},
    {'genre': 'history painting', 'oldest_year': 1530, 'painting_title': 'Portrait of Eleanor of Austria'},
    {'genre': 'portrait', 'oldest_year': 1530, 'painting_title': 'Portrait of Eleanor of Austria'},
    {'genre': 'mythological painting', 'oldest_year': 1788, 'painting_title': 'Paris and Helen'},
    {'genre': 'interior view', 'oldest_year': 1789, 'painting_title': 'The Lictors Bring to Brutus the Bodies of His Sons'},
    {'genre': 'nude', 'oldest_year': 1811, 'painting_title': 'Jupiter and Thetis'},
    {'genre': 'allegory', 'oldest_year': 1856, 'painting_title': 'The Source'},
    {'genre': 'figure painting', 'oldest_year': 1856, 'painting_title': 'The Source'},
    {'genre': 'genre art', 'oldest_year': 1862, 'painting_title': 'The Turkish Bath'}
]

# Sort data by year for better visualization
sorted_data = sorted(data, key=lambda x: x['oldest_year'])

# Extract genres and years
genres = [item['genre'] for item in sorted_data]
years = [item['oldest_year'] for item in sorted_data]

# Create figure and axis
fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(12, 8))

# Create horizontal bar chart
bars = ax.barh(genres, years, color='steelblue', edgecolor='navy', alpha=0.7)

# Customize the plot
ax.set_xlabel('Year', fontsize=12, fontweight='bold')
ax.set_ylabel('Genre', fontsize=12, fontweight='bold')
ax.set_title('Year of Oldest Painting per Genre', fontsize=14, fontweight='bold', pad=20)

# Add grid for better readability
ax.grid(axis='x', alpha=0.3, linestyle='--')

# Add year labels on the bars
for i, (bar, year) in enumerate(zip(bars, years)):
    ax.text(year + 5, i, str(year), va='center', fontsize=9, fontweight='bold')

# Adjust layout to prevent label cutoff
plt.tight_layout()

# Save the plot
plt.savefig('/home/bleon/git/XMODE/ArtWork/experiments/log-batch/anthropic-claude-sonnet-4-5-20250929/20251208-174301-r001/oldest_painting_per_genre.png', dpi=300, bbox_inches='tight')

print("Plot saved successfully!")
plt.close()

```
